import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../../context/AuthContext'; import apiService from '../../services/api'; import socketService from '../../services/socketService'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; import { Play, Clock, Users, Target, TrendingUp, Star, Brain, Zap, Award, ChevronRight, Trophy, BookOpen } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = () => { const stats = [ { title: 'Quizzes Completed', value: mockUser.stats.totalQuizzes.toString(), change: '+3 this week', icon: Target, color: 'text-primary-600', bgColor: 'bg-primary-100' }, { title: 'Total Points', value: mockUser.stats.totalPoints.toLocaleString(), change: '+127 this week', icon: Star, color: 'text-warning-600', bgColor: 'bg-warning-100' }, { title: 'Current Streak', value: `${mockUser.stats.currentStreak} days`, change: 'Keep it up!', icon: Zap, color: 'text-success-600', bgColor: 'bg-success-100' }, { title: 'Rank', value: `#${mockUser.stats.rank}`, change: '+2 this week', icon: TrendingUp, color: 'text-secondary-600', bgColor: 'bg-secondary-100' }, ]; return (
